Class OrderDonutsController

java.lang.Object
application.OrderDonutsController
public class OrderDonutsController
extends java.lang.Object
Donut controller for OrderDonuts.fxml GUI
Author:
Craig Li, Prerak Patel

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void add​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Adds donut(s) to the current order, which is displayed on the listview (donutOrderDisplay).
    (package private) void addToOrder()
    Adds all donuts on the current order display to the current store order.
    (package private) void changeDonutSelection​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Changes the donut choices available based on the donut type (yeast donuts are different than cake donuts).
    private void checkIfEmpty()
    Checks if the order is empty, disables add to order and remove buttons if empty.
    (package private) void initialize()
    Initializes the GUI of OrderDonuts.fxml
    (package private) void remove​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Removes donut(s) from the order display, and updates the current total to match.
    private void resetFields()
    Resets Donut GUI default/blank values, and updates the image to correspond.
    (package private) void setDonutFlavor​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Sets the donut choice given a user input.
    (package private) void updateImage()
    Optional image switcher that updates an imageview on the GUI to match the current donut choice.

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • resetFields

      private void resetFields()
      Resets Donut GUI default/blank values, and updates the image to correspond.

    • add

      void add​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Adds donut(s) to the current order, which is displayed on the listview (donutOrderDisplay). Added in a format of () ($)

    • remove

      void remove​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Removes donut(s) from the order display, and updates the current total to match.

    • addToOrder

      void addToOrder()
      Adds all donuts on the current order display to the current store order.

    • updateImage

      void updateImage()
      Optional image switcher that updates an imageview on the GUI to match the current donut choice.

    • setDonutFlavor

      void setDonutFlavor​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Sets the donut choice given a user input.

    • checkIfEmpty

      private void checkIfEmpty()
      Checks if the order is empty, disables add to order and remove buttons if empty.

    • changeDonutSelection

      void changeDonutSelection​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Changes the donut choices available based on the donut type (yeast donuts are different than cake donuts).

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initializes the GUI of OrderDonuts.fxml
